name: Ramify
description: A single screen isometric puzzle game with over 100 levels.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: 64bit only
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
